mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.mserialno AS "mserialno", a.mpsplanid AS "mpsplanid", a.processbillno AS "processbillno", a.batchno AS "batchno", a.routinebillno AS "routinebillno", a.routingcode AS "routingcode", a.seqno AS "seqno", a.isassigned AS "isassigned", a.prodcode AS "prodcode", a.prodname AS "prodname", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.obj_sn AS "objsn",
item.spec_model AS "prodspec", process.planbdate AS "proddate"
LEFT JOIN mdm_item item ON item.code=a.prodcode LEFT JOIN sfc_processdetail process ON process.processbillno=a.processbillno
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ppc_mserialno a
${dataScope}
AND a.mserialno LIKE '%'||#{mserialno}||'%' '%'+#{mserialno}+'%' concat('%',#{mserialno},'%')
AND a.obj_sn LIKE '%'||#{objsn}||'%' '%'+#{objsn}+'%' concat('%',#{objsn},'%')
AND a.mpsplanid LIKE '%'||#{mpsplanid}||'%' '%'+#{mpsplanid}+'%' concat('%',#{mpsplanid},'%')
AND a.processbillno LIKE '%'||#{processbillno}||'%' '%'+#{processbillno}+'%' concat('%',#{processbillno},'%')
AND a.batchno LIKE '%'||#{batchno}||'%' '%'+#{batchno}+'%' concat('%',#{batchno},'%')
AND a.routinebillno LIKE '%'||#{routinebillno}||'%' '%'+#{routinebillno}+'%' concat('%',#{routinebillno},'%')
AND a.routingcode LIKE '%'||#{routingcode}||'%' '%'+#{routingcode}+'%' concat('%',#{routingcode},'%')
AND a.seqno = #{seqno}
AND a.isassigned = #{isassigned}
AND a.prodcode LIKE '%'||#{prodcode}||'%' '%'+#{prodcode}+'%' concat('%',#{prodcode},'%')
AND a.prodname LIKE '%'||#{prodname}||'%' '%'+#{prodname}+'%' concat('%',#{prodname},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.mpsplanid DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ppc_mserialno( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, mserialno, mpsplanid, processbillno, batchno, routinebillno, routingcode, seqno, isassigned, prodcode, prodname, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{mserialno}, #{mpsplanid}, #{processbillno}, #{batchno}, #{routinebillno}, #{routingcode}, #{seqno}, #{isassigned}, #{prodcode}, #{prodname}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ppc_mserialno SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, mserialno = #{mserialno}, mpsplanid = #{mpsplanid}, processbillno = #{processbillno}, batchno = #{batchno}, routinebillno = #{routinebillno}, routingcode = #{routingcode}, seqno = #{seqno}, isassigned = #{isassigned}, prodcode = #{prodcode}, prodname = #{prodname}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
